entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [APICompat] AssemblyLoadErrors should not be saved as CompatDifference #34064
    Backlog

Closed

  • #next #33831
  • Allow specifying path to local SDK in global.json #33924
  • Consider adding `.idea` to gitignore #34050
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205

PullRequests

Created

  • Add separate warnings for settings that depend on illink pack #34077
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Add EnableGeneratedComInterfaceComImportInterop property to control the source-generated/built-in COM interop interaction feature switch. #34072
    Area-NetSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .idea to .gitignore #34044
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set EnableRequestDelegateGenerator=true when PublishTrimmed=true #34022
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Keep TrimMode=partial for projects targeting .NET 7 or below #34030
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Default to RazorLangVersion 8.0 in .NET 8.0 #33756
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Switch the VM image of the macOS #33783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #34051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
